lead_paragraph: Swansea City's new Italian head coach Francesco Guidolin saw his relegation-threatened team win at Everton for the first time on Sunday to lift them four points above the Premier League's bottom three places.

headline.print_headline: Swansea Beat Everton in Guidolin's First Game in Charge
headline.main: Swansea Beat Everton in Guidolin's First Game in Charge

snippet: Swansea City's new Italian head coach Francesco Guidolin saw his relegation-threatened team win at Everton for the first time on Sunday to lift them four points above the Premier League's bottom three places....
